item.title: CVE-2024-43938|2024-09-18T13:55:37.977Z -- jeroen%20peters -- name%20directory
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation (XSS or 'Cross-site Scripting') vulnerability in Jeroen Peters Name Directory allows Reflected XSS.This issue affects Name Directory: from n/a through 1.29.0.
